name: Me Llamo Art Charity Auction Day 1. "Heaven Meets Earth"

metadata.name: Ruby Island #1/30
metadata.description:
Ruby Island is one of 4 small islands situated in lake WƒÅnaka, my home town. I live in one of the most picturesque parts of the world and it is such a blessing to be inspired by my surroundings every day. I wanted to capture the tranquility and serenity that this place brings to so many people. 

Artist: Lisa Nicole
